about_the_game:
CEO Sim: Cyberpunk is a turn-based economic strategy about corporation management in the world of cyberpunk. A corporate war is approaching and, in addition to worries about the development of the company, sooner or later you will have to choose your side. Although you shouldn’t forget about the board of directors - these are the people who gave you control over the company and they can also take it away.

Setting

After the great war all over the world, real power was in the hands of large corporations. The same thing happened in Core City - two largest corporations are fighting for power in the city: Coven and Syndicate. The situation in the city is heating up and sooner or later their conflict will turn into a military clash.

At the same time, Virtual Dreams, a major developer of virtual worlds, is experiencing a financial crisis. The board of directors decided to invite you to the position of CEO in order to solve the accumulated problems. Lead the company out of crisis and prepare for the impending war. Corporations will not miss the opportunity to put you under their control.

You will have to sacrifice the independence of the company and take someone's side or become an enemy to everyone.

Game Features

This is a turn-based economic strategy

Each turn corresponds to one quarter and consists of 2 stages: planning and reaction.

First, you need to solve all the accumulated problems, and then, with the help of initiatives, plan changes in the company's work.

With a complex company structure

The company is presented in the form of a unique complex structure of interrelated indicators.

They are combined into 5 departments, the effectiveness of each of which is expressed in the form of 6 regular and 2 key indicators, which you can change with the help of initiatives and hired managers.

However, be careful, all aspects of the company's work are important, it is necessary to find the balance of financing. In addition, the manager is unlikely to like managing an underfunded department.

Non-linear story

The CEO must make many difficult decisions, each of which can have unexpected consequences. Important advice - never skimp on security!

The system of relations with corporations will allow you to choose your path:

  • In the first chapter, you need to pull the company out of the financial crisis, while simultaneously establishing relationships with other corporations;

  • Depending on the choices you made in the first chapter, in the second chapter you will find yourself in the middle of an erupting corporate war with the only task - to survive and maintain control of the company in your hands.

And different endings

Depending on your performance and the choices you make, you will get your own unique ending.

Try different paths - together with the element of chance, this will make each new game unique.

Virtual Dreams will be led by a pragmatic manager who earns money by any means, a principled leader respected by the team, or a real criminal - it’s up to you to decide!
